channel.title: Webclient Help
channel.description:
Right, I don't understand why, when I jar the webclient it makes the ip 127.0.0.1
The Ip in Gui.class is ______ server ip. But it won't connect to that.
Can some one please tell me why it won't connect to my server ip.
When I open run.bat it works perfectly, but when I open the jar file it doesn't work :s
Why is this?
Client Base: Bluurr.
Thanks for reading.

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I set the manifest to ‘client’ is that correct?

& I done all of this, I’ll just double check.

EDIT:
Nevermind, My friend helped me fix. Thanks for the help anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

If you are JARing the same files as where your Run.bat is, it’ll have same IP. Check your client class for the server IP too.
Make sure you have manifest’d you webclient correctly too…

Read full topic
